update T_DEF_MANAGE_COM
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_CODE = #{record.manageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_NAME = #{record.manageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_NAME_SHORT = #{record.manageNameShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_ENNAME = #{record.manageEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MANAGE_INNER_CODE = #{record.manageInnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_DEF_MANAGE_COM set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_CODE = #{record.manageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_NAME = #{record.manageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_NAME_SHORT = #{record.manageNameShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_ENNAME = #{record.manageEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_ENNAME_SHORT = #{record.manageEnnameShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_INNER_CODE = #{record.manageInnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_DATE = #{record.openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CLOSE_DATE = #{record.closeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MMONITOR_TYPE = #{record.mmonitorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MMONITOR_CODE = #{record.mmonitorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIPCODE = #{record.zipcode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INSERT_TIME = #{record.insertTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{record.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSE_TYPE = #{record.licenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INNER_FID = #{record.innerFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_DEF_MANAGE_COM
FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_CODE = #{manageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_NAME = #{manageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_NAME_SHORT = #{manageNameShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_ENNAME = #{manageEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_ENNAME_SHORT = #{manageEnnameShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_INNER_CODE = #{manageInnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_DATE = #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MMONITOR_TYPE = #{mmonitorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MMONITOR_CODE = #{mmonitorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIPCODE = #{zipcode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=DATE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSE_TYPE = #{licenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INNER_FID = #{innerFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_DEF_MANAGE_COM set FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_CODE = #{manageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_NAME = #{manageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_NAME_SHORT = #{manageNameShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_ENNAME = #{manageEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_ENNAME_SHORT = #{manageEnnameShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_INNER_CODE = #{manageInnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_DATE = to_date(#{openDate,jdbcType=DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD'), CLOSE_DATE = to_date(#{closeDate,jdbcType=DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD'), MMONITOR_TYPE = #{mmonitorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MMONITOR_CODE = #{mmonitorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIPCODE = #{zipcode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSE_TYPE = #{licenseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INNER_FID = #{innerFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.sql:
select tdm.id "id", tdm.manage_code "manageCode", tdm.fid "fid", tdm.manage_name "manageName", tdm.mmonitor_code "mmonitorCode", tdm.address "address", tdm.manage_name_short "manageNameShort", tdm.manage_enname "manageEnname", tdm.manage_enname_short"manageEnnameShort", tdm.manage_inner_code "manageInnerCode", tdm.status "status", to_char(tdm.open_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') "openDate", to_char(tdm.close_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') "closeDate", tdm.mmonitor_type "mmonitorType", tdm.email "email", tdm.zipcode "zipcode", tdm.insert_time "insertTime", tdm.last_modify_time "lastModifyTime", tdm.remark "remark", tdm.inner_fid "innerFid", tdm.license_type "licenseType", tdm.phone "phone" from t_def_MANAGE_COM tdm where 1=1
and tdm.id like '%' || #{id} || '%'
and tdm.manage_code like '%' || #{manageCode} || '%'
and tdm.fid like '%' || #{fid} || '%'
and tdm.manage_name like '%' || #{manageName} || '%'
and tdm.MMONITOR_CODE like '%' || #{mmonitorCode} || '%'
and tdm.address like '%' || #{address} || '%'
and tdm.manage_name_short like '%' || #{manageNameShort} || '%'
and tdm.manage_enname like '%' || #{manageEnname} || '%'
and tdm.manage_enname_short like '%' || #{manageEnnameShort} || '%'
and tdm.manage_inner_code like '%' || #{manageInnerCode} || '%'
and tdm.status like '%' || #{status} || '%'
and to_char(tdm.open_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') like '%' || #{openDate} || '%'
and to_char(tdm.close_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') '%' || #{closeDate} || '%'
and tdm.mmonitor_type like '%' || #{mmonitorType} || '%'
and tdm.email like '%' || #{email} || '%'
and tdm.zipcode like '%' || #{zipcode} || '%'
and tdm.insert_time like '%' || #{insertTime} || '%'
and tdm.last_modify_time like '%' || #{lastModifyTime} || '%'
and tdm.remark like '%' || #{remark} || '%'
and tdm.inner_fid like '%' || #{innerFid} || '%'
and tdm.license_type like '%' || #{licenseType} || '%'
and tdm.phone like '%' || #{phone} || '%'
order by tdm.id
